vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ναχώρ, ὁ indecl. (Heb. נָחוֹר),
Nahor: Luk.3:34.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.11.22;
son of: Serug (H8286);
father of: Terah (H8646)
§ Nahor
Nachor, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 3:34*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拿鶴
1) 亞伯拉罕家族中二個成員的名字, 基督的組先 (路 3:34)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拿鹤
1) 亚伯拉罕家族中二个成员的名字, 基督的组先 (路 3:34)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Na-cô: « thở mạnh, ngáy » Xem H5152.
